Html:
hi radioman,
Another suggestion,  how about adding a MINZOOM and MAXZOOM level for the markers, enabling markers to only appear at certain zoom levels ?
and also a DRAGABLE property , then the marker can raise OnDragBegin / OnDragEnd  events so the new co-ords can be saved back to the database etc.

Hi Radioman,

First of All, I will not hesitate to say that It is a Wonderful Project & product for those who understand this. I'm using WPF . I've studied and run your project. I've some questions Can You Please Explain them :-

  1.  How to Zoom the Map with Mouse Wheel ?
  2.  How to insert location name I mean Address on a particular Lat/Long ?
  3.  How to use this in WPF ?
  4.  Is this possible to change Lat/Long Values with mouse move ?
  5.  Main problemis that only two views I mean Settelite & Terrians working while other two not working it display nothing when select Map , Label , LabelSettelite.
  6.  Can I Zoom more than 17 ?

Waiting for your Early & Positive Reply.
Sincerely,
Usman

* first, wpf marker system isn't ready yet.

1. look at example, use wheel events
2. *
3. ;}
4. what do you mean?
5. use trunk version
6. depends on map provider

Dear Radioman !

First of all I would like to Pay Plenty of thanks for providing so quick Helping Response. Secondly, I want to know how to open Cache Database File ? I tried my best to search on the Web giving this extensiion .gmdb but could'nt succeeded. Pls tell me which database software can open such files ?

Looking Forward for your Positive & Early Response.

Your's Sincerely,
Usman
